title: Generative AI and LLMs: Architecture and Data Preparation
about: Explore the architecture of generative AI and large language models (LLMs), and learn about data preparation for training these models.

topics.name: LLM Architecture
topics.details: Understanding the structure and components of large language models.

topics.name: Data Preparation
topics.details: Preparing and cleaning data for training generative AI models.

summary: This module covers the fundamentals of generative AI architectures and the importance of data preparation for LLMs.
